subject: Delayed Order?
description_text:
Hello, 

I’m reaching about an order I placed on Sept 21st. The order hasn’t even been shipped yet, and I was just wondering if you had an update on my order? 

Order number is #SSN2705

Thanks, Seth Goley

conversations.body_text: Hi Sethgoley,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZJ201H40325326176
